publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6859 Margaret Smith: Wear it Pink 2010—That the Parliament recognises that over 4,000 women and 20 men in Scotland will be diagnosed with breast cancer this year; endorses Breast Cancer Campaign’s organisation of Wear it Pink on Friday 29 October 2010; understands the importance of the event in promoting awareness of breast cancer among the general public; encourages MSPs to participate in the initiative to help raise funds for innovative world-class breast cancer research at centres of excellence throughout the United Kingdom, and congratulates Breast Cancer Campaign and all of its supporters for having raised £3 million in 2009 through wear it pink. Supported by: John Scott*, Karen Gillon*, Kenneth Gibson*, Nanette Milne*, John Lamont*, James Kelly*, Bill Kidd*, Liam McArthur*, Jamie McGrigor*, Cathy Peattie*, Ms Wendy Alexander*, Mary Mulligan*, Christina McKelvie*, Stuart McMillan*
